item.description:
The Shock of the Global:

The 1970s in Perspective

This event is open to the public.

Location
CGIS South Building
1730 Cambridge St.
Tsai Auditorium (Room S010)

In March, Harvard University Press is publishing The Shock of the Global: The 1970s in Perspective, edited by Niall Ferguson, Charles S. Maier, Erez Manela, and Daniel J. Sargent.

Moderator/Chair
Cohen, Lizabeth
Chair, Department of History, and Howard Mumford Jones Professor of American Studies, Harvard University.

Speakers
Manela, Erez
Director, Graduate Student Programs; Executive Committee; Faculty Associate (on leave spring 2010). Professor of History, Department of History, Harvard University.
Ferguson, Niall
Faculty Associate. Laurence A. Tisch Professor of History, Department of History, and William Ziegler Professor of Business Administration, Harvard Business School.
Maier, Charles S.
Senior Adviser; Faculty Associate. Leverett Saltonstall Professor of History, Department of History, Harvard University.
Sargent, Daniel
Assistant Professor of U.S. History, Department of History, University of California at Berkeley.

WCFIA Special Event
Date: March 31, 2010
Time: 4:00 pm - 6:00 pm
item.name: Shock of the Global
